a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Global disease burden by region, 1990 to 2019
The total disease burden is measured as the number of Disability-Adjusted Life Years (DALYs) per year.
DALYs measure the total burden of disease â€“ both from years of life lost due to premature death and years lived with a disability. One DALY
equals one lost year of healthy life.
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2019)
